outcomes.name: Vector Recognition and Notation
outcomes.description: Can identify vectors, understand notation, and distinguish vectors from scalars.
outcomes.title: Vector Recognition and Notation

outcomes.name: Vector Operations Mastery
outcomes.description: Can perform vector addition, subtraction, and scalar multiplication accurately.
outcomes.title: Vector Operations Mastery

outcomes.name: Dot Product Computation
outcomes.description: Can calculate dot products and use them to find angles and test orthogonality.
outcomes.title: Dot Product Computation

outcomes.name: Geometric Vector Intuition
outcomes.description: Understands geometric interpretation of vector operations and can visualize vector relationships.
outcomes.title: Geometric Vector Intuition

outcomes.name: Linear Combination Recognition
outcomes.description: Can identify and construct linear combinations of vectors.
outcomes.title: Linear Combination Recognition

outcomes.name: Span Computation and Analysis
outcomes.description: Can determine if a vector lies in the span of a set of vectors.
outcomes.title: Span Computation and Analysis

outcomes.name: Geometric Understanding of Span
outcomes.description: Understands span as lines, planes, or higher-dimensional subspaces.
outcomes.title: Geometric Understanding of Span

outcomes.name: Linear System Formulation
outcomes.description: Can translate real-world problems into systems of linear equations.
outcomes.title: Linear System Formulation

outcomes.name: Gaussian Elimination Mastery
outcomes.description: Can perform row operations to solve linear systems using elimination.
outcomes.title: Gaussian Elimination Mastery

outcomes.name: Solution Set Interpretation
outcomes.description: Can interpret solutions as unique, infinite, or no solution and understand geometric meaning.
outcomes.title: Solution Set Interpretation

outcomes.name: Matrix Operations Proficiency
outcomes.description: Can perform matrix addition, scalar multiplication, and matrix multiplication.
outcomes.title: Matrix Operations Proficiency

outcomes.name: Matrix Properties Understanding
outcomes.description: Understands properties of matrix operations including non-commutativity.
outcomes.title: Matrix Properties Understanding

outcomes.name: Linear Independence Testing
outcomes.description: Can determine if a set of vectors is linearly independent or dependent.
outcomes.title: Linear Independence Testing

outcomes.name: Basis Identification and Construction
outcomes.description: Can identify and construct bases for vector spaces and subspaces.
outcomes.title: Basis Identification and Construction

outcomes.name: Dimension and Coordinate Systems
outcomes.description: Understands dimension as the size of a basis and can work with coordinate representations.
outcomes.title: Dimension and Coordinate Systems

outcomes.name: Matrix Inverse Computation
outcomes.description: Can compute matrix inverses using row reduction techniques.
outcomes.title: Matrix Inverse Computation

outcomes.name: Determinant Calculation
outcomes.description: Can compute determinants of 2×2 and 3×3 matrices using various methods.
outcomes.title: Determinant Calculation

outcomes.name: Invertibility-Determinant Connection
outcomes.description: Understands the relationship between determinants, invertibility, and linear independence.
outcomes.title: Invertibility-Determinant Connection

outcomes.name: Vector Space Properties
outcomes.description: Understands vector space axioms and can verify if a set is a vector space.
outcomes.title: Vector Space Properties

outcomes.name: Subspace Identification
outcomes.description: Can identify subspaces and understand null space and column space.
outcomes.title: Subspace Identification

outcomes.name: Linear Transformation Recognition
outcomes.description: Can recognize linear transformations and verify linearity properties.
outcomes.title: Linear Transformation Recognition

outcomes.name: Transformation Matrix Construction
outcomes.description: Can construct matrix representations of linear transformations.
outcomes.title: Transformation Matrix Construction

outcomes.name: Rank-Nullity Theorem Application
outcomes.description: Can apply the rank-nullity theorem to analyze linear transformations.
outcomes.title: Rank-Nullity Theorem Application

outcomes.name: Eigenvalue Calculation
outcomes.description: Can find eigenvalues by solving characteristic equations.
outcomes.title: Eigenvalue Calculation

outcomes.name: Eigenvector Determination
outcomes.description: Can find eigenvectors and eigenspaces for given eigenvalues.
outcomes.title: Eigenvector Determination

outcomes.name: Matrix Diagonalization
outcomes.description: Can determine if a matrix is diagonalizable and perform diagonalization.
outcomes.title: Matrix Diagonalization

outcomes.name: Orthogonality Testing
outcomes.description: Can test for orthogonality and find orthogonal complements.
outcomes.title: Orthogonality Testing

outcomes.name: Projection Computation
outcomes.description: Can compute orthogonal projections onto vectors and subspaces.
outcomes.title: Projection Computation

outcomes.name: Real-World Application Integration
outcomes.description: Can apply linear algebra concepts to solve problems in various fields.
outcomes.title: Real-World Application Integration

outcomes.name: Linear Algebra Synthesis and Mastery
outcomes.description: Can integrate multiple concepts to solve complex problems and explain solutions to others.
outcomes.title: Linear Algebra Synthesis and Mastery
